text: You're feeling lonely?

Hey, what's up, Lily?

Not much, just got back from a pretty long day at the office, was thinking about you guys and how we should catch up soon, maybe we can plan something for the weekend, [pauses to collect her thoughts] I was talking to my friend Emily and she was saying how we should all go out to that new bar that just opened up in town.

I'm talking about the one downtown, it's supposed to have a really cool rooftop view and they're having a grand opening party this weekend, Emily said it's gonna be lit, [pauses to collect her thoughts] I was thinking we could all meet up there and grab a few drinks, sounds like a fun night out to me.
